title: How Can I Eat Joy Food and Lose Weight?
itunes:title: How Can I Eat Joy Food and Lose Weight?
description:
Get the Free Course here:

http://phit.click/freecourse

 

In this episode I talked about joy food and exception food. How do you include foods you love AND lose weight at the same time. I also touch on why we do it. If the process of losing weight FEELS bad you are likely to never keep your weight off.
